extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected System and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the system is affected by retrieving the installed version of Session Smart Router, Conductor, or WAN Assurance Router.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system affected by the vulnerability?

extracted_playbook.title: Update to Latest Version
extracted_playbook.description: Update affected devices to the latest versions to mitigate the vulnerability.

affected_products: Session Smart Router & Conductor: All versions before 5.6.15
